description: Instantly revives designated Resonator. Can only be used once every 60 seconds. Only effective on your own Resonator in Co-op mode.
bgDescription:
Single Revival Potion
[Effect] Partially stabilizes Resonators' states and aids in regaining consciousness.
[Precautions] Long intervals between doses are recommended. Excessive use within a short period is not advisable.
[Contraindications] Avoid using this potion alongside similar potions or frequency-stabilizing potions.
